content:
On 2022-02-11, We will be reviewing 2 tickets on the Da Vinci Plan net IG that were received during the STU Update Peer Review Period. During this meeting we will be looking for consensus in the Da Vinci/Plan net community on a resolution that will be brought to the Sponsoring workgroup, Financial Management (FM) for vote.
The tickets are:
FHIR-35191 - FHIR US Core 3.1 is required for payers to support CMS regulation @Corey Spears
FHIR-34875 - Practitioner profile should use base FHIR proficiency extension @Linda Michaelsen

Then we will look to move forward with the publication approval process.
